https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bUgnRjzhVinVxeSvz7Gr97QKmZS.jpg After the death of their father, two brothers decide to travel to hunt and strengthen their bonds. However, they are surprised when they themselves see the prey of a deadly creature that roams the desert. Desert Shadows
